events.message: The customer reported a car collision that occurred at an intersection yesterday afternoon and filed the initial claim with basic accident details.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the report and determining the incident involved a vehicle collision.
An agent specialized in auto claims was promptly assigned to the case to ensure efficient handling and communication with the customer.
The customer has received official acknowledgment of the claim submission along with information on the next steps to follow.
The insurance company requested photographs of the damaged vehicle, a police report, and a copy of the driver’s license for verification purposes.
The customer submitted all the requested documents including the police report and photos showing the extent of the car’s damage.
An investigation team began assessing the claim, reviewing submitted evidence and contacting involved parties for additional statements.
The investigation into the accident has been completed, confirming the details provided by the claimant and assessing liability.
A settlement offer has been prepared and sent to the customer covering the estimated repair costs and associated expenses.
The customer responded to the settlement proposal expressing satisfaction with the amount and the handling of their claim.
The claim has been officially approved following confirmation from the customer and agreement on the settlement terms.
Payment for the repair costs and damages was processed and transferred to the customer’s account promptly.
The claim was officially closed after payment issuance and confirmation that the customer’s vehicle repairs were completed.
All documents and records related to this auto accident claim have been archived according to company policy for future reference.
